org.opends.server.tools.upgrade

Class Installation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.upgrade.Installation

  • public final class Installation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the physical state of an OpenDJ installation. All the operations are dependent upon the root directory that is specified in the constructor.
